newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Indus Group EPS raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Indus Group EPS raised.

text.p: -- Robertson Stephens & Co said analyst Eric Upin raised his earnings estimate for full year 1997 for The Indus Group to $0.66 a share from a previous $0.62 a share.
-- He also set a 1998 estimate of $0.90 a share and repeated a buy rating on the stock.

-- In a statement Upin said Indus, a provider of high-end maintenance and engineering software for capital intensive industries such as electric utilities, benefits from strong fundamentals and an increased visibility in its market.
-- Upin said Indus is "a compelling play" in the current era of deregulation among electric utility companies.
-- Shares were trading at 21, off 1/4 in midday exchange trade.
